title: Central Manila Stay in Pasig City with Outdoor Pool
description: Amongst grand skyscrapers and memories of Spanish architecture sits the Holiday Inn Manila Galleria, an IHG Hotel. Be romanced by the famous Manila sunset with a rooftop cocktail in the nightlife district of Poblacion, a hive of after-dark fun. Hit all the tourist spots in a colourful Jeepney and tour the historic ‘Walled City’ of Intramuros, or live like a local and eat your way down the high street. After endless exploration, cool off with a dip in the hotel’s outdoor pool.
location_description: Holiday Inn Manila Galleria, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: One Asian Development Bank Avenue, Pasig City 1655, Philippines
